name: Don't Lettuce Down
description:
Don't lettuce down!

Submission for Weekly Game Jam 122 
Theme: One Action

Objective: Get to the top

Challenge: Evil lettuces that just bring you down

Weapon: Your fist

How to Play:

Click and drag to charge your punch, then let go to punch

Gameplay Video: https://streamable.com/g6nqh

Music & Sounds FX by Nemecek
